title: Intro
lyrics:
[Intro]
(Huh, huh, huh) Ooh
(Dum-dum-dum) Ooh
(Dum-dum-dum, dum-dum) Ooh-ooh
[Verse]
I'll give you all I have
And nothing less, I promise
Love me and don't look back
I want you with me on this road to the sky
We'll be shining every night, I promise you
Just me and you
Oh, I promise you
